sourcesContent:
Weather Application

latitude:{{weatherData.latitude}}

Temperature:{{weatherData.current_weather.temperature}}°C

Humidity:{{weatherData.hourly.relativehumidity_2m[0]}}m

windspeed:{{weatherData.current_weather.windspeed}}m

weathercode:{{weatherData.current_weather.weathercode}}m

Weather Description: {{ getWeatherDescription(weatherData.current_weather.weathercode) }}

Elevation:{{weatherData.elevation}}
